title: How to Set Time to Day in Minecraft

steps.title: Open your world in Minecraft and make sure the cheats are on.
steps.content: Open your world in Minecraft and make sure the cheats are on. By default, cheats are disabled in a Survival world, while they're automatically enabled in a Creative world.

steps.title: Open the cheat console.
steps.content: Open the cheat console. Press the / key, sometimes said to be the ? key. You can also press T and enter in a forward slash manually, but pressing / puts it in automatically.

steps.title: Type the command.
steps.content: Type the command. To set the time to day, type "time set 1" or "time set day". The final command should look like either /time set 1 or /time set day , otherwise the game won't recognize it as a command.

steps.title: Hit Enter.
steps.content: Hit Enter . Once the processing is done, the game will change to day.
